data.description: Reviews the past, present, and future of the Arctic and Antarctic regions. Covers the history, geography, atmospheric and ocean circulations, permafrost, ice sheets, glaciers, and future state of the Arctic and Antarctica as projected by earth system models. Also explores the role of the polar regions in the earth's system and associated global climatic feedbacks.
data.title: POLAR REGIONS AND THEIR IMPORTANCE IN THE GLOBAL ENVIRONMENT
